attributes.action: Remove the booking system for Cheltenham Recycling Centre
attributes.additional_details: Having a booking system will create more fly tipping as people who work full time will not be able to get appointments they require. The local streets will have more waste
attributes.background: The local authority (Cheltenham Borough) have been trying to dwindle the site down for years. We need the facility open as it has been without a booking system

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about Cheltenham Recycling Centre are a matter for Cheltenham Borough Council, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition Cheltenham Borough Council directly: https://www.cheltenham.gov.uk/a_to_z/service/256/petitions
